data.title: Nuremberg Trial records
data.text:
Military Tribunal No. II, Case No. 4, The United States of America -against- Oswald Pohl, et. al., Defendants: Opening Statement for The United States of America

Scope and Contents

This is the opening statement for the United States of America against Oswald Pohl, et. al.

Case Files, Military Tribunal n. 3, Case n. 3, Wolfgang Mettgenberg Document Book 6

Scope and Contents

Contents: Excerpts from publications discussing Reich law. Affidavits This was submitted by Attorney at Law, Dr. Alfred Schlif.

Case Files, Military Tribunal n. 3, Case n. 3, Prosecution Document Book 4 Supplement) (English/German)

Scope and Contents

This is a collection of papers detailing prison sentences.

Case Files, Military Tribunal n. 3, Case n. 3, Document Book 1 Supplement (English)

Scope and Contents

This is a collection of papers detailing legal procedures.

Case Files, Military Tribunal n. 3, Case n. 3, Document Book 1 Supplement (German)

Scope and Contents

This is mostly a collection of affidavits and decrees documenting Nazi meetings and political ideologies.

Case Files, Military Tribunal n. 3, Case n. 3, Prosecution Document Book 2 (English)

Scope and Contents

This is a collection of papers detailing legal procedure in the era of the Third Reich.

Case Files, Military Tribunal n. 3, Case n. 3, Oswald Rothaug Document Book 6

Scope and Contents

This is a collection of affidavits.

Case Files, Military Tribunal n. 3, Case n. 3, Oswald Rothaug Document Book 8

Scope and Contents

This collection includes excerpts from the special court cases of: Bellmer, Hillebrand, and Becher.

Case Files, Military Tribunal n. 3, Case n. 3, Oswald Rothaug Document Book 9

Scope and Contents

This is mostly a collection of letters and court files.

Case Files, Military Tribunal n. 3, Case n. 3, Oswald Rothaug Document Book 11 (Supplement to Doc. Books 5a, 6, 8)

Scope and Contents

This is a collection of Bavarian police files, excerpts from the Geishauser/Schieber/Becher files, photos, and affidavits.

Case Files, Military Tribunal n. 3, Case n. 3, Curt Rothenberger Document Book 1

Scope and Contents

This is a collection of affidavits and newsletters.

Case Files, Military Tribunal n. 3, Case n. 3, Curt Rothenberger Supplement to Document Book 2

Scope and Contents

This mostly a collection of letters, affidavits, and an excerpt from the book "Die Wandlung." This collection was submitted by Erich Wandschneider.

Case Files, Military Tribunal n. 3, Case n. 3, Curt Rothenberger Document Book 3

Scope and Contents

These papers mostly document the "German justice." This collection was submitted by Erich Wandschneider.

Case Files, Military Tribunal n. 3, Case n. 3, Curt Rothenberger Supplement to Document Book 3

Scope and Contents

These documents detail the process of a court appeal. This was submitted by Erich Wandschneider, Attorney.

Case Files, Military Tribunal n. 3, Case n. 3, Curt Rothenberger Supplement to Document Book 3

Scope and Contents

These papers detail police actions. This was submitted by Erich Wandschneider, Attorney.

Case Files, Military Tribunal n. 3, Case n. 3, Curt Rothenberger Document Book 4

Scope and Contents

This is mostly a collection of affidavits.

Case Files, Military Tribunal n. 3, Case n. 3, Franz Schlegelberger Document Book 1

Scope and Contents

These papers mostly detail Reich law. This was submitted by Dr. Egon Kubuschok, Attorney.

Case Files, Military Tribunal n. 3, Case n. 3, Franz Schlegelberger Supplement 1 to Doc. Book

Scope and Contents

This is a collection of affidavits and papers detailing England. This was submitted by Dr. Kubuschok.

Case Files, Military Tribunal n. 3, Case n. 3, Franz Schlegelberger Document Book 2

Scope and Contents

This is mostly a collection of affidavits. This was submitted by attorney, Dr. Egon Kubuschok.

Case Files, Military Tribunal n. 3, Case n. 3, Franz Schlegelberger Supplement 2 to Document book (English)

Scope and Contents

This is mostly a collection of exceprts from "Monatshefte fuer Auswaertige Politik" and other papers that detail Reich court procedures. This was submitted by Dr. Kubuscheck.

Case Files, Military Tribunal n. 3, Case n. 3, Franz Schlegelberger Document Book 3

Scope and Contents

This is mostly a collection of ordinances, decrees, and affidavits detailing Polish territories/people. This was delivered by attorney-at-law Dr. Egon Kubuschok.

Case Files, Military Tribunal n. 3, Case n. 3, Franz Schlegelberger Supplement 3 to Document Book

Scope and Contents

This was presented by Dr. Kuboschok.

Case Files, Military Tribunal n. 3, Case n. 3, Franz Schlegelberger Document Book 4

Scope and Contents

This is mostly a collection of affidavits and law papers. This was presented by Dr. Egon Kubuschok, Attorney-at-Law.

Case Files, Military Tribunal n. 3, Case n. 3, Franz Schlegelberger Supplement to Document Book 4

Scope and Contents

This is an "Extract from Reich Law Gazette, Year 1941, part 1, No. 133 Date of issue: 26 November 1941 Pages 722-724."

Case Files, Military Tribunal n. 3, Case n. 3, Franz Schlegelberger Document Book 5 (English)

Scope and Contents

This is mostly a collection of papers from the Reich Law Gazette detailing the handling of diseases.

Case Files, Military Tribunal n. 3, Case n. 3, Franz Schlegelberger Document Book 5 (German)

Language of Material: German.

Scope and Contents

"Inhaltsverzeichnis zum Dokumenrenbuch V Scchlegelberger."

Case Files, Military Tribunal n. 3, Case n. 3, Rudolf Oeschey Document Book 1 (English) & Supplement

Scope and Contents

This is a collection of affidavits. This was submitted by Attorney, Dr. Werner Schubert.

Case Files, Military Tribunal n. 3, Case n. 3, Rudolf Oeschey Document Book 1 (German)

Language of Material: German.

Case Files, Military Tribunal n. 3, Case n. 3, Rudolf Oeschey Document Book 1 (English)

Scope and Contents

This is a collection of excerpts from Reich Law publications. This was submitted by Werner Schubert.

Case Files, Military Tribunal n. 3, Case n. 3, Rudolf Oeschey Document Book 2 (German)

Scope and Contents

"Dokumentenbuch II fuer Rudolf Oeschey" "Ueberreicht durch Rechtsanwalt Dr. Werner Schubert."

Case Files, Military Tribunal n. 3, Case n. 3, Rudolf Oeschey Document Book 3 (English)

Scope and Contents

This collection mostly contains a series of Special Court files and Reich law publications. These files were presented by Attorney, Dr. Werner Schubert.

Case Files, Military Tribunal n. 3, Case n. 3, Rudolf Oeschey Document Book 3 (German)

Scope and Contents

"Dokumentenbuch III fuer Rudolf Oeschey" "Ueberreicht durch Rechtsanwalt Dr. Werner Schubert."

Case Files, Military Tribunal n. 3, Case n. 3, Rudolf Oeschey Document Book 4 (English)

Scope and Contents

This collection mostly contains a series of Special Court files and Reich law publications. These files were presented by Attorney, Dr. Werner Schubert.

Case Files, Military Tribunal n. 3, Case n. 3, Rudolf Oeschey Document Book 4 (German)

Scope and Contents

"Dokumentenbuch IV fuer Rudolf Oeschey" "Ueberreicht durch Rechtsanwalt Dr. Werner Schubert."

Case Files, Military Tribunal n. 3, Case n. 3, Rudolf Oeschey Document Book 5 (English)

Scope and Contents

This mostly contains Special Court files, Reich criminal procedure, and Reich Court of Justice decisions. This was submitted by attorney-at-law Dr. Werner Schubert.

Case Files, Military Tribunal n. 3, Case n. 3, Rudolf Oeschey Document Book 5 (German)

Scope and Contents

"Dokumentenbuch V fuer Rudolf Oeschey" "Ueberreicht durch Rechtsanwalt Dr. Werner Schubert."

Case Files, Military Tribunal n. 3, Case n. 3, Guenther Nebelung Document Book 1

Scope and Contents

This is a series of affidavits.

Case Files, Military Tribunal n. 3, Case n. 3, Guenther Nebelung Supplement to Document Book 2

Scope and Contents

These documents discuss Nebelung in relation to the Reich Supreme Court. This was offered by Dr. Karl Doetzer.

Case Files, Military Tribunal n. 3, Case n. 3, Petersen Document Book 1

Scope and Contents

This is mostly a collection of Reich law publications and criminal procedure details.

Case Files, Military Tribunal n. 3, Case n. 3, Petersen Document Book 2

Scope and Contents

This is mostly a collection of international law papers and penal codes.

Case Files, Military Tribunal n. 3, Case n. 3, Petersen Document Book 3

Scope and Contents

This is mostly a collection of affidavits.

Case Files, Military Tribunal n. 3, Case n. 3, Petersen Supplement to Doc. Book

Scope and Contents

This is a collection of affidavits and an "Extract from the American Basic Field Manual."

Case Files, Military Tribunal No. 3 Case No. 3, USA Opening Statement

Language of Material: English.

Scope and Contents

Military Tribunal No. III, Case No. 3, The United States of America -against- Josef Alstotter, et al., Defendants. Opening Statement for the United States of America. Nurnberg, 5 March, 1947.

Case Files, Military Tribunal No. 3 Case No. 3, USA Opening Statement (duplicate)

Language of Material: English.

Scope and Contents

2 copies of the contents of Box 222, Folder No. 11

Military Tribunal No. III, Case No. 3, The United States of America -against- Josef Alstotter, et al., Defendants. Opening Statement for the United States of America. Nurnberg, 5 March, 1947.

Case Files, Military Tribunal No. 3 Case No. 3, Rules

Language of Material: English.

Scope and Contents

Military Tribunal No. III, Case No. 3, The United States -against- Josef Altstoetter, et.al. The Rules of Malice, Intent, Purpose, and Responsibility, which apply here. Submitted: Charles M. LaFollette and Robert D. King

Military Tribunal No. III, Case No. 3, The United States -against- Josef Altstoetter, et.al. The Rules by which the Relationships set out in law 10, Art. I, Par. 2, are to be interpreted. Submitted: Charles M. LaFollette and Robert D. King

Military Tribunal No. III, Case No. 3, The United States -against- Josef Altstoetter, et.al. Definitions of the Crimes which are punishable under law 10. Submitted: Charles M. LaFollette and Robert D. King

Military Tribunal No. III, Case No. 3, The United States -against- Josef Altstoetter, et.al. The Rules of interpretation of criminal statutes and the Rules of procedure which apply here. Submitted: Charles M. LaFollette and Robert D. King

Military Tribunal No. III, Case No. 3, The United States -against- Josef Altstoetter, et.al. Cronological Summary of Documentary Proof Received in Evidence on the Issue of "Nacht und Nebel" during Prosecution Case-in-Chief. Submitted: Charles M. LaFollette and Robert D. King

Case Files, Military Tribunal No. 3 Case No. 3, Judgement (part 1)

Language of Material: English.

Scope and Contents

Military Tribunal No. III, Case No. 3, Judgement. United States Military Tribunals sitting in the place of Justice, Nuernberg, Germany at a session of Military Tribunal III. The United States of America, Plaintiff.

Case Files, Military Tribunal No. 3 Case No. 3, Judgement (part 2)

Language of Material: English.

Scope and Contents

Military Tribunal No. III, Case No. 3, Judgement. United States Military Tribunals sitting in the place of Justice, Nuernberg, Germany at a session of Military Tribunal III. The United States of America, Plaintiff.

Military Tribunal No. III Case No. 3 Judgment Case Files Pp. 1-275 516401

Scope and Content

This covers pages 1-275. "THE UNITED STATES OF AMERICA, Plaintiff, Vs. JOSEF ALTSTOETTER, WILHELM VON AMMON, PAUL BARNICKEL, HERMANN CUHORST, KARL ENGERT, GUENTHER JOSEL, HERBERT KLEMM, ERNST LAUTZ, WOLFGANG METTGENBERG, GUENTHER NEBELUNG, RUDOLF OESCHEY, HANS PETERSEN, OSWALD ROTHAUG, CURT ROTHENBERGER, FRANZ SCHLEGELBERGER, and CARL WESTPHAL, Defendants. Judgment"

Case Files, Military Tribunal No. 4, Case No. 11, Walter Schellenberg Document Book 2

Scope and Contents

Documentbook II for the defendant Walter Schellenberg in Case 11 of the American Military Tribunal IV in nuernberg, presented by Dr. Riediger/Kurt O. Mintzel. Table of Contents see pages 2-3.

Case Files, Military Tribunal No. 4, Case No. 11, Lutz Schwerin von Krosigk Opening Statement

Scope and Contents

Case XI: The United States of America against Weizsaecker, et al, opening statement for Graf Schwerin v. Krosigk, delivered by Fritsch, Attorney-at-Law, Augsburg.

Case Files, Military Tribunal No. 4, Case No. 11, Lutz Schwerin von Krosigk Appeal

Scope and Contents

Petition to the Military Governor for Count Schwerin V. Krosigk, Nuernberg, 28 April 1949, delivered by Attorney-at-Law Fritsch, defense counsel for Schwerin-Krosigk. Appeal to the sentence of 10 years in prison for war crimes and crimes against humany. Explains why the case should be remitted.

Case Files, Military Tribunal No. 4, Case No. 11, Lutz Schwerin von Krosigk Supplement to Document Book

Language of Material: German.

Scope and Contents

Dokumenten Ergaenzungsband II fuer den Angeklagten Luz Graf Schwerin von Krosigk im Fall XI: Die Vereinigten Staaten von Amerika gegen von Weizsaecker, u. andere. Vorgelegt durch: Rechtsanwalt Fritsch, Augsburg. Inhalsverzeichnis mit Zusammenfassungen siehe Seiten 2-19.

Case Files, Military Tribunal No. 4, Case No. 11, G.A. von Steengracht Appeal

Scope and Contents

Petition to General Lucius D. Clay, Military Governor, for Baron Steengracht, filed 29 April 1949. Subject line: Petition for Modification, Emendation of the sentence imposed and for an Act of Grace. Steengracht was sentenced to seven years in prison for the commission of war crimes and crimes against humanity.

Case Files, Military Tribunal No. 4, Case No. 11, Wilhelm Stuckart Appeal

Scope and Contents

Appeal for Memorandum of Dr. Stuckart to the Secretary General, filed 6 May 1949. Calling to attention the errors which are contained in the Tribunal's judgment, requesting the correction of these errors through ammendment.

Case Files, Military Tribunal No. 4, Case No. 11, Wilhelm Stuckart Document Book 1a

Language of Material: German.

Scope and Contents

Militaertribunal IV, Fall 11: Dokumentenbuch IA fuer Dr. Wilhelm Stuckart. Thema: Dr. Stuckart's Stellunge. Uberreicht durch Rechtsanwaelte Dr. Hans Fritz von Zwehl, Curt F. Frhr. von Stackelberg.

Case Files, Military Tribunal No. 4, Case No. 11, Wilhelm Stuckart, Document Book 1b, 1c

Language of Material: German.

Scope and Contents

Militaer-Tribunal Nr. IV, Fall 11. Dokuemtenbuch IB fuer Dr. Wilhelm Stuckart. Thema: Dr. Stuckart's Verwantwortung.

Militaer-Tribunal Nr. IV, Fall 11. Dokuemtenbuch IC fuer Dr. Wilhelm Stuckart. Thema: Zugehoerigkeit zur SS.

Beide ueberreicht durch Rechtsanwaelte Dr. Hans Fritz von Zwehl und Curt F. Freiherr von Stackelberg.

Case Files, Military Tribunal No. 4, Case No. 11, Wilhelm Stuckart Document Book 2

Language of Material: German.

Scope and Contents

Militaertribunal IV, Fall 11. Dokumentenbuch II fuer Dr. Wilhelm Stuckart. Thema: "Stuckart als Mensch". Inhalsverzeichnis und kurzes Vorwort auf Seite 3 ff.

Case Files, Military Tribunal No. 4, Case No. 11, Wilhelm Stuckart Supplements to Document Book 2

Language of Material: German.

Scope and Contents

Militaertribunal IV, Fall 11. Dokumentenbuch II (Ergaenzungsband) fuer Dr. Wilhelm Stuckart. Thema: Stuckart als Mensch.

Uberreicht durch Rechtsanwaelte von Zwehl und von Stackelberg.

Case Files, Military Tribunal No. 4, Case No. 11, Wilhelm Stuckart Document Book 3a

Language of Material: German.

Scope and Contents

Militaertribunal IV, Fall 11. Dokumentenbucg IIIA fuer Dr. Wilhelm Stuckart. Thema: "Angriffskrieg". Uberreicht durch Anwalte Dr. von Zwehl und von Stackelberg. Dokumente beziehen sich auf Ziffer 6 der Anklage (Entlassung von politisch und rassisch unerwuenschten Beamten an den Universitaeten und Schulen).

Case Files, Military Tribunal No. 4, Case No. 11, Wilhelm Stuckart Document Book 3b

Language of Material: German.

Scope and Contents

Militaer-Tribunal Nr. IV, Fall 11. Dokumentenbuch IIIB fuer Dr. Wilhelm Stuckart. Thema: Angriffskrieg. Uberreicht durch Rechtsanwaelte von Zwehl und von Stackelberg.

"Die Nachstehenden Dokumente beweisen, dass in der von Dr. Stuckart geleiteten Abteilung des Innenministeriums keine auf einen Angriffskrieg gerichteten Vorberietungen getroffen worden sind."

Case Files, Military Tribunal No. 4, Case No. 11, Wilhelm Stuckart Document Book 4

Language of Material: German.

Scope and Contents

Militaer-Tribunal IV, Fall 11. Dokumentenbuch Nr. IV fuer Dr. Wilhelm Stuckart. Thema: "Eingliederungen". Uberreicht von Rechtsanwaelten von Zwehl und von Stackelberg.

Die Dokumente beziehen sich auf Ziffer 19 (Russlandfeldzug), Ziffer 21 und Ziffer 22 (Inbesitznahme der neuen Gebiete) der Anklage.

Case Files, Military Tribunal No. 4, Case No. 11, Wilhelm Stuckart Document Book 5a

Language of Material: German.

Scope and Contents

Dieses Dokumentenbuch widmet sich dem Thema "Germanisierung" mit Hinblick auf Dr. Stuckart's Rolle. Die anliegenden Dokumente sollen die Unterdrueckunspolitik des polnischen Staates gegenueber den deutschen Minderheiten in Polen in den Jahren 1918-1939 belegen. Zudem sind Dokumente angefuegt, die die humanitaere Einstellung Stuckart's zu den Ostvoelkern darstellen sollen.

Case Files, Military Tribunal No. 4, Case No. 11, Wilhelm Stuckart Document Book 5b

Language of Material: German.

Scope and Contents

Dokumentenbuch VB (Fortsetzung von VA) fuer Dr. Wilhelm Stuckart, zum Thema "Germanisierung." Durch die beigelegten Dokumente, versucht die Verteidigung die Handlungen Stuckarts in den besetzten Ostgebieten, wie zB Vertreibungspolitik, zu rechtfertigen/als legal darzustellen.

Case Files, Military Tribunal No. 4, Case No. 11, Wilhelm Stuckart Document Book 6a

Language of Material: German.

Scope and Contents

Dokumentenbuch VIA fuer Dr. Wilhelm Stuckart thematisiert die "Judenfrage" im Hinblick auf Stuckarts Verhalten/Handlungen.

Case Files, Military Tribunal No. 4, Case No. 11, Wilhelm Stuckart Document Book 6b

Language of Material: German.

Scope and Contents

Dokumentenbuch VIB fuer Dr. Wilhelm Stuckart thematisiert die "Judenfrage" im HInblick auf Stuckart's Handlungen.

Case Files, Military Tribunal No. 4, Case No. 11, Wilhelm Stuckart Document Book 7

Language of Material: German.

Scope and Contents

Dokumentenbuch VII fuer Dr. Wilhelm Stuckart thematisiert "Pluenderung und Zwangsarbeit". Laut Verteidigung beweisen die folgenden Dokumente, dass

a. Stuckart kein Mitglied des Ministerrates war b. Stuckart keinerlei Zustaendigkeit bei wirtschaftlichen Fragen hatte c. Stuckart kein Weisungsrecht fuer nicht deutsche Gebiete hatte d. Stuckart mit den wirtschaftlichen Fragen des besetzten Ostgebiets nichts zu tun hatte.

Case Files, Military Tribunal No. 4, Case No. 11, Wilhelm Stuckart Document Book 8

Language of Material: German.

Scope and Contents

Dokumentenbuch VIII fuer Dr. Wilhelm Stuckart thematisiert "Rechtsgrundlagen" des Tribunals an sich: "Die Verteidigung erhebt grundsaetzliche Einwendungen gegen die Rechtsgueltigkeit des Kontrollratsgesetzes Nr. 10 und die Zustaendigkeit dieses Hohen Tribunals.

Case Files, Military Tribunal No. 4, Case No. 11, Wilhelm Stuckart Supplement to Document Book

Scope and Contents

English and German version of the Supplements to the Document Books for Stuckart. For Index see page 12.

Case Files, Military Tribunal No. 4, Case No. 11, Wilhelm Stuckart Document Book - Rebuttal

Language of Material: German.

Scope and Contents

Dokumentenbuch (Gegen-Rebuttal) fuer Dr. Wilhelm Stuckart. Index siehe Seite 3.

Case Files, Military Tribunal, n. 4, Case n. 11, Paul Koerner Supplement 2 to Doc Books 2, 3, and 4.

Scope and Contents

This is mainly a collection of affidavits, letters, and memo excerpts. This was submitted to Military Tribunal IV by Dr. Justus Koch, Attorney-at-Law.

Case Files, Military Tribunal, n. 4, Case n. 11, Edmund Veesenmayer, Supplement to Document Book 3 (English)

Scope and Contents

These papers contain British, German, French, and Yugoslavian officials addressing: the count 1 of the indictment: "Aggressive War against Czechoslovakia (Slovakia), Poland (Danzig), and Yugoslavia (Croatia)."

Case Files, Military Tribunal IV, Case 11, Final Brief on the Criminal Responsibility of Otto von Erdmannsdorff

Scope and Contents

"The United States of America v. Ernst von Weizsaecker, et al." By: Max Mandellaub-Trial Attorney and Robert Kempner-Director, Political Ministries Division For: Telford Taylor-Brigadier General, USA Chief of Counsel for War Crimes Of Counsel: Wolf von Eckardt Jane Lester"

Table of Contents: I. The Charges II. Career and Positions of Responsibility III. The Role of the Political Division in the Genocidal Program IV. Erdmannsdorff's Responsibility for the Planning and Implementation of the Program of Exterminating the Jews of Europe. V. Defense Arguments IV. Conclusion

Case Files, Military Tribunal IV, Case 11, Final Brief on the Criminal Responsibility of Karl Ritter Under Count III

Scope and Contents

"The United States of America v. Ernst von Weizsaecker, et al."

By: Maximillian Koessler-Associate Trial Counsel H.W. William Caming-Deputy Director, Ministries Division Robert M.W. Kempner-Director, Political Ministries Division

For: Telford Taylor-Brigadier General, USA Chief of Counsel for War Crimes Of Counsel: Arnold Buchtal, Henry Einstein, Mark Schaeffer"

Table of Contents: "Introduction: The Scope of present brief and certain findings of the IMT."

I. Ritter's Criminal Activities under Count III. II. The Applicable Law concerning III. Proposed Findings of Facts. IV. Conclusion."

Case Files, Military Tribunal, n. 4, Case n. 11, Gottlieb Berger Document book 1, 2, 3

Language of Material: German.

Scope and Contents

Dokumentenbuch fuer Gottlobb Berger.

Case Files, Military Tribunal, n. 4, Case n. 11, Richard Walther Darre' Supplement to Document Book 1 & 2

Scope and Contents

This was presented by Dr. Hans Merkel, Defense Counsel. This is an affidavit and a copy in German is included.

Case Files, Military Tribunal, n. 4, Case n. 11, Emil Puhl Reply to the Prosecution's Brief

Scope and Contents

This was filed by Dr. Hans Gawlik.

Case Files, Military Tribunal, n. 4, Case n. 11, Emil Puhl Document Book 5, 6 (German)

Scope and Contents

"Dokumentenbuch V fuer Emil Puhl Ueberreicht durch: Dr. Hans Gawlik, z.Zt. Nuernberg, Militaergerichtshof IV."

Case Files, Military Tribunal, n. 4, Case n. 11, Emil Puhl Document Book 7 & Supplement 3

Scope and Contents

This is a collection of affidavits detailing Puhl's actions and attitudes toward financial matters. This was submitted by Dr. Hans Gawlik.

Case Files, Military Tribunal, n. 4, Case n. 11, Otto Rasch Principal Lines of the Defense

Scope and Contents

The defendant pleads not guilty to the charges of Crimes Against Humanity, War Crimes, and Membership in Criminal Organizations.

Case Files, Military Tribunal No. 4, Case No. 11, Document Books for Dietrich

Language of Material: English.

Scope and Contents

Military Tribunal No. IV, Case No. XI, Document Book I for Dr. Otto Dietrich, Submitted by: Dr. Friedrich Bergold, Attorney at Law Nuernberg. Reasons for the attacks made by the German Press against Roosevelt and the U.S. Press.

Military Tribunal No. IV, Case No. XI, Document Book II for Dr. Otto Dietrich, Submitted by: Attorney Dr. Friedrich Bergold, Nuernberg. Do Press directives concerning the aerial war - especially the directive... to use the term "risal" refer to the killing of Allied pilots?

Military Tribunal No. IV, Case No. XI, Document Book III for Dr. Otto Dietrich, Submitted by: Dr. Friedrich Bergold, Attorney at Law, Nuernberg. Poland.

Case Files, Military Tribunal No. 4, Case No. 11, Document Book for Dietrich

Language of Material: English.

Scope and Contents

Military Tribunal No. IV, Case No. XI, Document Book IV A for Dr. Otto Dietrich, Submitted by Dr. Friedrich Bergold, Attorney at law, Nuremberg. Dr. Goebbel's Influence on the Press.

Case Files, Military Tribunal No. 4, Case No. 11, Document books for Dietrich

Language of Material: English.

Scope and Contents

Military Tribunal No. IV, Case No. XI, Document Book VI for Dr. Otto Dietrich, Submitted by: Attorney Dr. Friedrich Bergold, Nuernberg. Amann's and Weiss' influence on the German Press.

Military Tribunal No. IV, Case No. XI, Document Book VII for Dr. Otto Dietrich, Submitted by: Attorney Dr. Friedrich Bergold, Nuernberg. Documents concerning Dietrich's activity and excerpts from his publications.

Military Tribunal IV, Case No. 11 The United States of America v. Ernst von Weizaecker, et al Closing Statement for The United States of America. Pp. 1-59 516742

Scope and Content

This covers pages 1-59. This represents Military Tribunal IV, Case No. 11 "THE UNITED STATES OF AMERICA v. ERNST VON WEIZSAECKER, et al

CLOSING STATEMENT FOR THE UNITED STATES OF AMERICA

Nurnberg, Germany 9 November 1946

Of Counsel: Drexel A. Sprecher Acting Chief of Counsel"

Military Tribunal IV, Case No. 11 The United States of America v. Ernst von Weissaecker, et al. Final Brief on Crimes Against Peace of the Defendant Ernst von Weizsaecker 516748

Scope and Content

This covers pages 1-227. This represents Military Tribunal IV, Case No. 11 "THE UNITED STATES OF AMERICA v. ERNST VON WEISSACKER, et al.

FINAL BRIEF ON CRIMES AGAINST PEACE OF THE DEFEDNAT ERNST VON WEIZSAECKER

Nurnberg 15 November 1948

BY: H.W. William Caming, Deputy Director, Political Ministries Division. and Robert M.W. Kempner, Director, Political Ministries Division."

Military Tribunal IV, Case No. 11 The United States of America v. Ernst von Weizsaecker, et al. Final Brief Against the Defendant Gustav Adolf Steengracht von Moyland on Count V. War Crimes and Crimes Against Humanity France and Denmark 516754

Scope and Content

This covers pages 1-41. This represents Military Tribunal IV, Case No. 11 "THE UNITED STATES OF AMERICA v. ERNST VON WEIZSAECKER, et al.

FINAL BRIEF AGAINST THE DEFENDNAT GUSTAV ADOLF STEENGRACHT VON MOYLAND ON COUNT V. WAR CRIMES AND CRIMES AGAINST HUMANITY FRANCE AND DENMARK

By: Robert Kempner, Director, Political Ministries Division and H.W. William Caming Deputy Director, Political Ministries Division." This folder includes the German transcript as well.

Military Tribunal No. IV, Case No. 11, The United States of America -against- Ernst von Weizsaecker, et al. Dissenting Opinion by Judge Leon W. Powers

Scope and Contents

This dissenting opinion was authored by Judge Leon W. Powers.

Military Tribunal No. IV, Case No. 11: United States of America against Ernst von Meizsaecker, et al. Reply to the Final Brief of the Prosecution against Dr. G.A. von Steengracht concerning Court V of the Indictment part Denmark and France

Scope and Contents

This is from Military Tribunal No. IV, Case No. 11, United States of America against Ernst von Meizsaecker, et al. It also contains a copy of the same documents in German.
